overview: "Ing" had attached a CD to his laptop to find some pictures. The information is full of old memories about "Dream", her ex-girlfriend. causing her to think back on the stories between her and Dream Including the end of her relationship She misses and wants to go back and fix the mistakes she made. Finally, she came up with the question: “If I could turn back time, would things get better?”
tagline: If I could turn back time, would things get better?
title: Throwback Thursday
